Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The Gutrend pillagers and brigands are taking hostages and must be stopped.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:6#1061#Gutrend brigands} and {@LinkCreature:6#1062#pillagers} in Colchester.

Report to Zandra in Lumbertown when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
